Auth.introduction: Bloom apne remote courses ke madhyam se survivors ko jankaari deta hai aur empower karta hai. Inn courses mein trauma, gender-based hinsa aur therapeutic takneekein shaamil hai taki survivors trauma se heal ho paye.
Auth.getStartedBloom: Bloom ke saath shuruat karte hain
Auth.getStartedWith: {partnerName} code ke saath shuru karte hain
Auth.loginLink: Aapke paas pehle se he account hai? <loginLink>Login kariye</loginLink>
Auth.terms: Jaari rakhkar, aap sanket de rahe hai aap hamari <policiesLink>Sevao ki Sharte aur Privacy Policy</policiesLink> sweekaar kar rahe hain.

register.title: Account banaiye
register.loginRedirect: Aapke paas pehle se he account hai? <loginLink>Log in</loginLink>
register.partnershipsDescription: Agar aap Bloom par hamare kisi partner se aa rahe hain, toh unke logo kar click kariye.

form.contactPermissionLabel: Kya hum Bloom ko behtar banane ke bare mein feedback ke liye aapko email kar sakte hain?
form.resetPasswordStep1: Hum aapko ek email bhejenge taki aap apna password reset kar sakein.
form.resetPasswordStep2: Bas aap anth tak pahuchne wale hain! Ab aap apna naya password set kar sakte hain.
form.resetPasswordSent: Bloom ke reset link ke liye apna email check kariye. Aapko email nahi mila? Apna junk folder check kariye ya fir email resend kariye.
form.passwordResetSuccess: Aapka password reset ho gaya hai! Ab aap apne naye password ke saath log in karna jari rakh sakte hain.
form.createUserError: Aapka account set up karne mein error aa raha hai. Firse baad mein prayas kariye aur <contactLink>Bloom team ko message kariye</contactLink>  agar aapko fir bhi yeh error aa raha hai.
form.getUserError: Aapka account retrieve karne mein error aa raha hai. Baad mein dubara prayas kariye aur <contactLink>Bloom team ko message kariye</contactLink> agar aapko fir bhi error aa raha hai.

codeErrors.internal: Aapke access code ko validate karne mein error aa raha hai. Firse baad mein prayas kariye aur <contactLink>Bloom team ko message kariye</contactLink>  agar aapko fir bhi yeh error aa raha hai.
codeErrors.expired: Yeh code expire ho chuka hai. {partnerName} team sampark karein.
codeErrors.invalid: Aapka access code invalid hai. Typos ki jaanch karein ya fir {partnerName} team se sampark karein.
codeErrors.alreadyInUse: Yeh code pehle se he istemaal ho chuka hai. Agar aapko lagta hai ki koi galti hui hai, toh {partnerName} ki team se sampark karein.

firebase.authError: Humein uss email aur password ke combination ka koi account nahi mila. Apna email aur password check keejiye.
firebase.invalidEmail: Apka email invalid aa raha hai, jaari rakhne ke liye kripya typos ko theek karein.
firebase.tooManyAttempts: Bahut saare viphal login prayaas, krpaya kuchh minat prateeksha karen ya apana paasavard abhee reeset karen.
firebase.weakPassword: Aapke password ko thoda aur lamba hone ki zaroorat hai taki vo aur surakshit ho.
firebase.emailAlreadyInUse: Yeh email Bloom ke saath pehle se he registered hai, <loginLink>login</loginLink> par jaiye jaari rakhne ke liye.
firebase.invalidCode: Yeh reset password link ab samaapt hogaya hai, kripya <resetLink>prakriya restart kariya</resetLink> aur fir prayas kariya.
firebase.expiredCode: This reset password link is now expired, please <resetLink>restart the process</resetLink> and try again.
